meta.name: description
meta.content: Evergreen Park Elementary School District 124 is comprised of five schools: four elementary schools (serving grades Kindergarten through 5) established in each of the four “quadrants” of the Village, and one middle school equidistant from the elementary schools located in the heart of Evergreen Park.

div.p: Inspire, Empower, Achieve...Every Student, Every Day

header.h2: Find Lesson Plans On Teachers' Seesaw/Google Classroom Pages

div.p: The District will continue to follow our recently implemented E-Learning procedures through the conclusion of the 2019-2020 school year on Friday, June 5. Paper copies of the curriculum are available at the District Office daily from 9 a.m.-3:30 p.m.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 2700px; height: 900px;

div.div: During the current closure, the goals of our E-Learning program will be to establish continuity of education for students at all grade levels, create online curricular options that provide flexibility in learning and time dedicated to learning each day, and to establish a mechanism for instructional staff to interact with students and their families electronically.

img.alt: Find Lesson Plans On Teachers' Seesaw/Google Classroom Pages Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Find Lesson Plans On Teachers' Seesaw/Google Classroom Pages

article.div: The District will continue to follow our recently implemented E-Learning procedures through the conclusion of the 2019-2020 school year on Friday, June 5. Paper copies of the curriculum are available at the District Office daily from 9 a.m.-3:30 p.m.
Families are invited to decorate a rock and place it along the sidewalk by their house/apartment for all to see

img.alt: Superintendent Search: Board Now Plans To Hire Interim Replacement Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Superintendent Search: Board Now Plans To Hire Interim Replacement

article.div: Search for a permanent replacement tabled, for now, due to complications related to the coronavirus pandemic

img.alt: Central donates supplies to Little Company Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Central donates supplies to Little Company

article.div: Science Department sends nearly 300 pairs of goggles, 800 gloves, and 84 heavy-duty aprons to the hospital

img.alt: Grab-and-Go Meals available each weekday Thumbnail Image

article.div: Breakfast and lunches free to anyone 18 and younger from 9-11 a.m. at CMS at door 13W, off Spaulding Avenue.

img.alt: D124 families ask questions, get answers Thumbnail Image

h1.a: D124 families ask questions, get answers

article.div: District 124's new Question & Answer page gives community chance to review frequently asked questions
Links to all communication sent to families since the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic

article.div: Access helpful documents that will walk families through the process of logging into student devices

div.span: Cartons of Milk Served Each Year
